title: encrypts data stored
extract: Storage encryption is the use of encryption/decryption of backed-up and archived data, both in transit and on storage media. ... In addition, two encryption arrangements can be used, one for data in transit and the other for stored and archived data.
extract_html: Storage encryption is the use of encryption/decryption of backed-up and archived data, both in transit and on storage media. ... In addition, two encryption arrangements can be used, one for data in transit and the other for stored and archived data.
